alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 19 at 3:31PM CDT until April 21 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and wintry mix possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 or more inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northwest Minnesota and northeast North Dakota. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Western Walsh County
